plot: A man finds himself tormented daily by a picture hanging on his wall. Can he remove the picture before he ends up consumed by it.
title: The Ugliest Picture
plot_es: A man finds himself tormented daily by a picture hanging on his wall. Can he remove the picture before he ends up consumed by it.
plot_en: A man finds himself tormented daily by a picture hanging on his wall. Can he remove the picture before he ends up consumed by it.
